enableAccessControl.description: Flag to enable or disable RBAC Search Configuration globally.

useNaturalLanguageSearch.description: If true, uses more flexible natural language search (fuzziness, synonyms, etc.) globally.

aggregations.description: List of global aggregations to include in the search query.

highlightFields.description: Which fields to highlight by default.

termBoosts.description: List of field=value term-boost rules that apply only to this asset.

fieldValueBoosts.description: Optional list of numeric field-based boosts applied globally.

assetTypeConfigurations.description: List of per-asset search configurations that override the global settings.

defaultConfiguration.description: Fallback configuration for any entity/asset not matched in assetTypeConfigurations.

assetType.description: Name or type of the asset to which this configuration applies.

useNaturalLanguageSearch.description: Override global 'useNaturalLanguageSearch' for this specific asset.

searchFields.description: Which fields to search for this asset, with their boost values.

highlightFields.description: Which fields to highlight for this asset.

aggregations.description: List of additional aggregations for this asset type.

termBoosts.description: List of field=value term-boost rules that apply only to this asset.

fieldValueBoosts.description: List of numeric field-based boosts that apply only to this asset.

scoreMode.description: How to combine function scores if multiple boosts are applied.

boostMode.description: How the function score is combined with the main query score.

additionalSettings.description: Catch-all for any advanced or asset-specific search settings.

boost.description: Relative boost factor for the above field.

field.description: The keyword field to match, e.g. tier.tagFQN, tags.tagFQN, certification.tagLabel.tagFQN, etc.

value.description: The exact keyword value to match in the above field.

boost.description: Numeric boost factor to apply if a document has field==value.

field.description: Numeric field name whose value will affect the score.

factor.description: Multiplier factor for the field value.

modifier.description: Optional mathematical transformation to apply to the field value.

missing.description: Value to use if the field is missing on a document.

condition.description: Conditional logic (e.g., range constraints) to apply the boost only for certain values.

name.description: A descriptive name for the aggregation.

type.description: The type of aggregation to perform.

field.description: The field on which this aggregation is performed.
